scripts.build-dev: rimraf bundled-dist && wasm-pack build --dev --target web --out-name js-framework-benchmark-seed --out-dir bundled-dist && cpr index.html bundled-dist/index.html && rimraf bundled-dist/.gitignore
scripts.build-prod: echo This is a no-op. && echo Due to heavy dependencies, the generated javascript is already provided. && echo If you really want to rebuild from source use: && echo npm run build-prod-force
scripts.build-prod-force: rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-pack && rimraf bundled-dist && wasm-pack build --release --target web --out-name js-framework-benchmark-seed --out-dir bundled-dist && cpr index.html bundled-dist/index.html && rimraf bundled-dist/.gitignore
